Newbury Joining Vodafone is more than a job, what we do matters. We don’t just carry minutes, texts and data – we carry people’s lives. And that’s a huge responsibility. If you think for a minute about the people you rely on…the likelihood is they rely on us. Customers are at the heart of everything we do and we want to make a difference to the lives of our customers, and the communities in which we live and work. results.description: We are recruiting for Retail Assistants and Managers for a well established British, everyday home essentials, company.Positions include online media marketing, residential brochure delivery, merchandise delivery with team management and business leadership opportunities available.Income varies widely, depending on responsibilities and number of hours worked and will discussed in interviews. Training is fully provided.
results.title: Retail Assistant / Manager

results.description: Working flexible hours to suit, we are currently recruiting for Customer Retail Associates to promote merchandise through either online media, retail literature or both.A well known British consumer company whom provides themselves on a strong training program. Team Leaders also required with incomes over in excess of £25k for the ambitious.
results.title: Customer Retail Associate

results.description: Our client, a well established household name, is looking for Sales Retail Advisors and Team Managers to promote household essentials to residential markets via online media or through retail literature.Full training is provided, so involvement in this industry previously is not required.Income is largely performance based, with massive opportunities to progress.
results.title: Sales Retail Advisor / Manager

results.description: We have a few positions available for those with good customer service skills who also enjoy a sales environment.The role does not require any cold calling, the products market themselves through online media and local literature to residential markets. Our client prides on their strong training programme.Progression opportunities available, with large potential commission incomes to those whom excel with management opportunities existing.
